revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The natural son; a play, in five acts, by Augustus von Kotzebue...being the original of Lovers' vows...Translated from the German by Anne Plumptre...who has prefixed..."
revision.text: Possibly: The natural son; a play, in five acts, by Augustus von Kotzebue...being the original of Lovers' vows...Translated from the German by Anne Plumptre...who has prefixed a preface...and has also annexed a life of Kotzebue. (London : Printed for R. Phillips, 1798). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1331838~S5
